text: Edwin Frank Basinski (November 4, 1922 January 8, 2022) was an American former professional baseball infielder. He played in Major League Baseball for the Brooklyn Dodgers and Pittsburgh Pirates. His career lasted between 1944 until 1947.Oldest Living MLB Player He died in Gladstone on January 8, 2022, at the age of 99. ==References== ==Other websites== *Eddie Basinski at SABR (Baseball BioProject) *Eddie Basinski at Baseball Almanac *Eddie Basinski at Pura Pelota (Venezuelan Professional Baseball League) *Pacific Coast League Hall of Fame Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brooklyn Dodgers players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Sportspeople from Buffalo, New York
title: Eddie Basinski
